group_1.textLeft: What did I say...?

group_1.textRight: You said... "I'm going to be another corpse @down in those waters."

group_1.textLeft: Why would that sentence make you reconsider...?

group_1.textRight: ...As you said, I am a pawn.
All I know about myself is that I'm meant to aid @the Land of the Rising Sun and its people,
and that I've been ordered to deal with situations @that threaten the village.
I didn't know what would happen when I no longer @fought as a Diviner...
Or rather, I had doubts about it, but I put them out @of my mind...

group_1.textLeft: Doubts...?

group_1.textRight: Yes...
I did know that Diviners have to leave someday.
But even though I live outside the village...@in the closest town to the village...
I had never seen another Diviner...

group_1.textLeft: And so my words...

group_1.textRight: Yes. An awful scene suddenly flashed @through my mind...
Could all the Diviners who "left" be those corpses @in the water...?

group_1.textLeft: That's the reason you saved us...

group_1.textRight: Yes. I needed to ask you directly about what @happened...

group_1.textLeft: Then, it's my turn to talk... About what I heard @during the coming-of-age ceremony.

group_1.textRight: You mean that conversation I saw...?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah. Mikoshiba said this to me, without an ounce @of shame...
Let me tell thee the truth before thy departure.

group_1.textRight: The...truth?

group_1.textLeft: Indeed. The truth about ye Diviners.

group_1.textRight: ...Please tell me.

group_1.textLeft: Diviners are the beings that shatter Devils.

group_1.textRight: Yes.

group_1.textLeft: Yet at the same time, they are the beings that @will become Devils in the future as well.

group_1.textRight: [chara:102500:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
Eh, that means...

group_1.textLeft: It's quite literal. Ye will all transform into Devils @one day.

group_1.textRight: You...must be joking, right?
If that's true, why did you withhold something @so important?

group_1.textLeft: I'm sure you're aware that such a harsh topic can't @be discussed easily.

group_1.textRight: ...Does my mother or anyone in the village @know this?
Did they know this, and still make us into Diviners?

group_1.textLeft: Nay. This knowledge is limited to myself as the @head priestess, and the dancers.

group_1.textRight: I don't understand...
If we, who shatter Devils, are going to become @Devils...
Then that's just a vicious cycle. There's no point in @us becoming Diviners.

group_1.textLeft: However, the fact remains that you can grant @wishes to save the Land of the Rising Sun.

group_1.textRight: [chara:102500:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
So what are we after that...?!

group_1.textLeft: Used-up dregs.

group_1.textRight: ...[wait:0.8][chara:102500:lipSynch_1]This is too cruel...
We literally sacrificed our souls, didn't we...?!

group_1.textLeft: Exactly.

group_1.textRight: Yeah... No... This isn't the time to cry...!
If I literally sacrificed my soul to the Land of the @Rising Sun...
My honor can be maintained...!
Even if I become a Devil, it won't erase anything @that I've achieved.
I can be proud of that, and so I can fight till I @eventually fall...!
So that's what the last ceremony was about. Acknowledging this truth, and enduring it...

group_1.textLeft: No.

group_1.textRight: [chara:102500:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
Then why did you tell me that truth?!

group_1.textLeft: Thou shalt become a Devil very soon.
Why? Because it occurs when thy Jewel loses its @shine.

group_1.textRight: ...[wait:0.8][chara:102500:lipSynch_1]Wait...
What is this "coming-of-age ceremony"...?

group_1.textLeft: Discarding a Diviner who has fulfilled her wish and @protected the village, and turning her into a Devil.
No Diviner hath ever left the village.

group_1.textRight: MIKOSHIBAAAAAA—――!!
Ah...

group_1.textCenter: Go on, now. Sink in the waterfall basin, struggle in @agony...and become feed for the next Diviner.
